## ğŸš€ FASTEST WAY TO START

### Option 1: One-Line Test Execution

Copy this to your GPT agent:

```
Execute: cd /Users/arog/framework/auto-coder && find generated/pages -name "*.js" -exec sed -i '' 's|../common/base-page|../../support/common/base-page|g' {} \; && ./auto-coder.sh test generated/features/jira-story-rs-end-point.feature && open file:///Users/arog/framework/auto-coder/generated/reports/custom/detailed-test-report.html
```

### Option 2: NPM Script

Copy this to your GPT agent:

```
cd /Users/arog/framework/auto-coder && npm run gpt-execute
```

### Option 3: Step-by-Step (Most Reliable)

Send your GPT agent to: **[gpt-conversation-template.md](./gpt-conversation-template.md)**
